Class DVD

  • java.lang.Object
    • DVD

  • public class DVD
extends java.lang.Object
    DVD.java
    Since:
    19/11/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alex Jones and Zak Chambers Hale No copyright infringements intended, holds no copyright. This class is a subclass of Resource, that will hold all of the base data. This class is for instantiation of DVD objects of type Resource and it adds the new fields that aren't pertinent in other Resource-type classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DVD(java.lang.String numberID, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String relYear, int resCount, java.lang.String director, java.lang.String runtime, java.lang.String language)
      This is a constructor for DVD type objects, and will build a DVD and assign respective fields.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DVD

        public DVD(java.lang.String numberID,
           java.lang.String title,
           java.lang.String relYear,
           int resCount,
           java.lang.String director,
           java.lang.String runtime,
           java.lang.String language)
        This is a constructor for DVD type objects, and will build a DVD and assign respective fields.
        Parameters:
        numberID - ID of the DVD.
        title - Title of the DVD.
        relYear - Release year of the DVD.
        resCount - Number of copies of the DVD.
        director - Director of DVD.
        runtime - Runtime of DVD.
        language - Language of DVD.
